title: Encroachment (gridiron football)
text:
In <a href="gridiron%20football">gridiron football</a>, there are several different rulings for encroachment:
The <a href="head%20linesman">head linesman</a> has the duty of watching out for encroachment and other similar infractions, and the <a href="Official_%28gridiron_football%29%23Line%20judge">line judge</a> assists in this process.
